languages.text: {n}Техножрец задумчиво опускает голову. Мехадендриты плавно замедляются, и стальные нотки исчезают из голоса Паскаля.{/n}
{n}The Tech-Priest lowers his head pensively. The mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from Pasqal's voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец задумчиво опускает голову. Мехадендриты плавно замедляются, и стальные нотки исчезают из голоса Паскаля.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡深思般地低下了头。他的机械触须缓缓地放慢了速度，声音中的金属音也不见了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest lowers his head pensively. The mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡深思般地低下了头。他的机械触须缓缓地放慢了速度，声音中的金属音也不见了。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote agacha la cabeza, pensativo. Sus mecadendritas se ralentizan de forma fluida y el tono acerado desaparece de la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest lowers his head pensively. The mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote agacha la cabeza, pensativo. Sus mecadendritas se ralentizan de forma fluida y el tono acerado desaparece de la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は物思いに耽り、その頭を下げる。パスカルの機械触手がなめらかに減速し、その声からは金属的な含意が消えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest lowers his head pensively. The mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は物思いに耽り、その頭を下げる。パスカルの機械触手がなめらかに減速し、その声からは金属的な含意が消えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester neigt nachdenklich den Kopf. Die Mechadendriten werden nahtlos langsamer und der stählerne Ton verschwindet aus Pasqals Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest lowers his head pensively. The mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester neigt nachdenklich den Kopf. Die Mechadendriten werden nahtlos langsamer und der stählerne Ton verschwindet aus Pasqals Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre baisse la tête, pensif. Ses mécadendrites ralentissent avec fluidité et sa voix s'adoucit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest lowers his head pensively. The mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre baisse la tête, pensif. Ses mécadendrites ralentissent avec fluidité et sa voix s'adoucit.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, dalgın bir edayla başını eğiyor. Mekadentritleri yavaş yavaş durgunlaşırken Pasqal'ın sesindeki çeliğimsi armonik sesler yok oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest lowers his head pensively. The mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from Pasqal's voice.{/n}
